39224.name: Durmand's Pen
39224.description: <c=@flavor>It's said that the pen is mightier...</c>

39225.name: Golden Relic of Rin
39225.description: <c=@flavor>Pillaged long ago from the ruined city of Rin.</c>

39226.name: Moon Shell
39226.description: <c=@flavor>A rare and beautiful shell from far-off Istan.</c>

39227.name: Consortium Charm
39227.description:
Guaranteed* to protect against any of a multitude of threats and indignities!

*Guarantee not legally binding.

39228.name: Halfmad's Mug
39228.description: <c=@flavor>Claimed to be the property of Brothander Halfmad, creator of Bear's Brown Ale, and the first norn to bring the art of brewing to his people.</c>

39229.name: Appleseller's Lucky Cog
39229.description: <c=@flavor>Smooth from having constantly been toyed with, the initials TL are etched roughly into the metal.</c>

39230.name: Marriner's Flask
39230.description: <c=@flavor>Said to have been the property of the legendary Cobiah Marriner, founder of Lion's Arch.</c>

39231.name: Fierceshot's Arrowhead
39231.description: <c=@flavor>Said to have belonged to the legendary charr archer Pyre Fierceshot.</c>

39232.name: Magister's Field Journal
39232.description: <c=@flavor>A collection of clever, dreamy notes penned in a flowing hand.</c>

39233.name: Althea's Ashes
39233.description: <c=@flavor>The legendary beauty who captured the heart of Prince Rurik, only to perish in the Searing of Ascalon.</c>

39234.name: Plague Idol
39234.description: <c=@flavor>An ancient relic of old Cantha, from the time of its corruption by the Deceiver's dark magic.</c>

39235.name: Matriarch's Quill
39235.description: <c=@flavor>Some of the savage power of the harpy that once wore this feather still resides in it.</c>

39236.name: Zinn's Data Crystal
39236.description: <c=@flavor>A rare copy of Zinn's research into the power of souls.</c>

39238.name: Imperial Chef Yileng's Golden Spoon
39238.description: <c=@flavor>The legendary chef gave these to his finest students.</c>

39240.name: Egg of the Crystal Queen
39240.description: <c=@flavor>These undeveloped eggs were supposedly found in the lair of Glint, the dragon oracle.</c>

39241.name: Armbrace of Truth
39241.description: <c=@flavor>An ancient Elonian relic said to have once been extremely valuable.</c>

39242.name: Celestial Sigil
39242.description: <c=@flavor>A prized possession of guilds in ancient times.</c>

buff.description:
+13 Condition Damage
+13 Precision
+13 Toughness
+13 Power
+13 Vitality
+13 Healing Power
+13 Ferocity

39243.name: Ancient Mursaat Token
39243.description: <c=@flavor>Some warn that the Mursaat will return to agonize the people of Tyria once more.</c>

39265.name: Mark of the Imperial Guard
39265.description: <c=@flavor>Formerly worn by a member of the Imperial Guards of Cantha.</c>

39266.name: The Shiniest Shiny
39266.description: <c=@flavor>So shiny that the skritt fear being blinded by its shininess.</c>

39267.name: Sandford's Medallion
39267.description: <c=@flavor>Said to be worn by the Traveler himself.</c>

39268.name: Collar of the First Commissar
39268.description: <c=@flavor>Rumored to be worn by the first dredge to break free from dwarven slavery.</c>

39269.name: Gwen's Necklace
39269.description: <c=@flavor>Given to Gwen by her beloved Keiran.</c>

39270.name: The Sleeping Seed
39270.description: <c=@flavor>This mysterious seed appears to be dormant.</c>

39271.name: Hymn to the Prophets
39271.description: <c=@flavor>Straight from the dark depths of krait-infested waters.</c>

39272.name: Call of the Wild
39272.description: <c=@flavor>Audible to those who seek their legend.</c>

39273.name: Mark of the Tethyos Houses
39273.description: <c=@flavor>This must have once belonged to a victim of a largos assassin.</c>

39274.name: Jade Wind Orb
39274.description: <c=@flavor>This relic of long-forgotten Cantha contains air captured from the Jade Winds.</c>

39275.name: Symbol of the Deceiver
39275.description: <c=@flavor>Some say the great deceiver of Cantha was a victim of the fates. Others call him a traitor.</c>

39276.name: Godrock Amulet
39276.description: <c=@flavor>Once an object of worship among the grawl.</c>

39278.name: The Heart of Mellaggan
39278.description: <c=@flavor>A precious jewel found in the depths of the ocean.</c>

39279.name: Blood of the Khan-Ur
39279.description: <c=@flavor>Forged in the blazing fires of the Black Citadel's foundry.</c>

39281.name: Jewel of Ahdashim
39281.description: <c=@flavor>The crown jewel from the vaults of Ahdashim.</c>

39282.name: The Eyes of Abaddon
39282.description: <c=@flavor>They burn with the fire of a forgotten god.</c>

39283.name: Eye of Janthir
39283.description: <c=@flavor>A tiny replica of a long-forgotten power.</c>

39305.name: Vekk's Solidified Aether Circuit
39305.description: <c=@flavor>A concoction of old technology and a tremendous ego.</c>

39306.name: Jalis Ironhammer's Crest
39306.description: <c=@flavor>Crest of the last king of the Deldrimor dwarves, Jalis Ironhammer.</c>

39308.name: Distinguished Circle of Logic
39308.description: <c=@flavor>A Rata Sum award for extraordinary genius.</c>

39311.name: Feather of the Owl
39311.description: <c=@flavor>This feather is said to have fallen from the spirit of Owl before being destroyed by Jormag.</c>

39312.name: The Golden Lotus
39312.description: <c=@flavor>An exotic gift that speaks of faraway lands.</c>

39341.name: Triforge Pendant
39341.description: "True greatness comes for those who have wisdom to do right, the courage to embark, and the power to follow through." -Logan Thackeray

39546.name: Preserved Red Iris Flower
39546.description: <c=@flavor>Lovingly preserved specimen of an exceedingly rare iris.</c>

39547.name: Kurzick Bauble
39547.description: <c=@flavor>Smuggled out of Cantha long ago, a relic of the Great House of Lutgardis.</c>

39550.name: Warmaster's Family Heirloom
39550.description: <c=@flavor>Generations of norn-etched runes cover this dolyak horn. The most recent is a symbol of the Vigil.</c>

39551.name: Totem of the Gorilla
39551.description: <c=@flavor>An intrepid norn artist paid respect to a far-flung Spirit of the Wild with this carving.</c>

39554.name: Fledgling Charm
39554.description: <c=@flavor>Young tengu are given charms like this for protection.</c>

39555.name: Anton's Secret
39555.description: <c=@flavor>An item to be hidden in the most unlikely of places.</c>

39558.name: Passiflora Karkinata
39558.description: <c=@flavor>An extremely rare and powerful floral specimen.</c>

39559.name: Ancient Karka Carapace
39559.description: <c=@flavor>Part of the ancient karka that attacked Lion's Arch. Mysterious magics seem to be woven into its chitinous shell.</c>

39562.name: Molten Ore
39562.description: <c=@flavor>A dark artifact of the combined forces of the Flame Legion and dredge. This ore seems too impure to properly refine, but it gleams with dark potential.</c>

39563.name: Big Mama's Tooth
39563.description: <c=@flavor>Legends speak of "Big Mama," the largest drake broodmother that ever lived. If she still does, it seems she's short at least one tooth.</c>

39566.name: Amulet of Protection
39566.description: <c=@flavor>Stolen from the body of a long-forgotten lord during the Guild Wars.</c>

39567.name: Salma's Diamond Jubilee Necklace
39567.description: <c=@flavor>Queen Salma's reign was long and prosperous. Such prosperity has long been missed in Kryta.<c>

39571.name: Amulet of the Skies
39571.description: <c=@flavor>A talented Durmand Priory scholar based this necklace on ancient astrological charts found on jotun megaliths.</c>

39574.name: Petrified Skull Juju
39574.description: <c=@flavor>An ancient relic of the mystic beings of Echovald Forest.</c>

39575.name: Nornbear's Remembrance
39575.description: <c=@flavor>Once a painful reminder to Jora of her brother's curse.</c>

39578.name: Archaic Grawl Necklace
39578.description: <c=@flavor>From a time before the grawl had a spoken language.</c>

39579.name: The Southsun Rose
39579.description: <c=@flavor>The largest pink diamond in all of Tyria.</c>

39582.name: Charisma
39582.description: <c=@flavor>The locket contains a picture of Kolijn Johansson, Trade Administrator of Hoelbrak.</c>

39583.name: Third-Place Medal
39583.description: <c=@flavor>Congratulations from the Divinity's Reach Fancy Cat Association! Everyone is fancy in their own way.</c>

39586.name: Prayer to Otter
39586.description: <c=@flavor>Otter is a fickle spirit, but when she does grant a boon, it is a powerful gift indeed.</c>

39587.name: The Queen's Necklace
39587.description: <c=@flavor>Commissioned for Queen Jennah by a council member, but found too ornate for her tastes.</c>

39588.name: Luxon Pendant
39588.description: <c=@flavor>Smuggled out of Cantha long ago, a relic of the Serpent Clan.<c>

39589.name: The Beetlestone Diamond
39589.description: <c=@flavor>Mined from the Onyx Fields of Southsun Cove for the pleasure of Lord Beetlestone.</c>

39590.name: Protomatter Chain
39590.description: <c=@flavor>Some strange, ethereal material from the Mists has solidified into this odd necklace.</c>
